1.title: Meet the 2014 Thiel Fellowship Finalists
1.plot: It's time for the bi-annual Under 20 Summit, where past, present, and future Thiel Fellows connect with one another and meet with mentors. In this Season 2 finale, the winners of this year's Thiel Fellowship reflect on their progress thus far, and share their goals for the future.

imdb.plot outline: 20 winners. $100,000 each. The chance to bring an idea to life. Christine Beebe co-directed along-side Milena Pastreich and produced this series shot on location in San Francisco that follows 40 student finalists as they compete for a coveted and controversial Thiel Fellowship. Their projects range from cancer research to new app technology, but there's just one catch if they win-they'll have to drop out of school.
